text: Lycée Les Pierres Vives is a senior high school/sixth form college in Carrières-sur-Seine, Yvelines, France, in the Paris metropolitan area. In 2016–2017, 1474 students were attending the high school, for a capacity of 1200 students. ==References== ==External links== * Lycée Les Pierres Vives Category:Lycées in Yvelines
title: Lycée Les Pierres Vives
